RESET.TITLE: Reset Password
RESET.SUBTITLE: Enter your registered email to send a reset link.
RESET.ERROR_GENERIC: An error occurred while processing the request.
RESET.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: If the email is registered, you will receive a link to reset your password.

WELCOME.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Your health in good hands. Manage appointments, consult your medical history, and keep a complete track of your well-being.
WELCOME.ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: Manage your comprehensive health for free with our telecare platform for older adults. Schedule appointments, receive reminders, chat with a doctor, and monitor your well-being. All in one place, with an accessible and easy-to-use design.
WELCOME.WORK_DESCRIPTION: We invite you to be part of a project that is changing the way older adults manage their well-being. We have created a comprehensive and free telecare platform that gives them back control over their health.

PATIENT.NO_DOCTOR_ASSIGNED: You don't have an assigned doctor
PATIENT.NO_DOCTORS_AVAILABLE: No doctors available at this time
PATIENT.SELECT_DOCTOR_INSTRUCTION: Click the button below to see the list of available doctors and choose yours
PATIENT.CLICK_TO_SELECT: Click the 'Select' button for your preferred doctor
PATIENT.NO_VITAL_SIGNS: You don't have vital signs registered yet
PATIENT.DOCTOR_WILL_REGISTER: Your doctor will register them in your first appointment

DASHBOARD.MY_HEALTH_DESC: Check your vital signs and keep track of your health

PROFILE.SUBTITLE: Manage your personal information

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Telecare platform for older adults. Manage your health, schedule appointments and stay connected with healthcare professionals.

REGISTER.TITLE: User Registration
REGISTER.NAME: First Name
REGISTER.TERMS: I accept the terms and conditions

TERMS.TITLE: Terms and Conditions
TERMS.INTRO: Welcome to the Health System. By accessing and using this platform, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services.
TERMS.SECTION_1_TEXT: By registering and using this platform, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you should not use our services.
TERMS.SECTION_2_TEXT: The Health System is a digital platform designed to facilitate communication between patients and healthcare professionals. Our services include:
TERMS.SERVICE_2: Secure communication between patients and doctors
TERMS.SECTION_3_TEXT: To use our services, you must:
TERMS.REQUIREMENT_1: Provide truthful, current, and complete information during registration
TERMS.REQUIREMENT_2: Maintain the confidentiality of your password
TERMS.REQUIREMENT_3: Immediately notify any unauthorized use of your account
TERMS.REQUIREMENT_4: Be over 18 years old or have authorization from a legal guardian
TERMS.SECTION_4_TEXT: You agree NOT to use the platform for:
TERMS.PROHIBITED_4: Interfering with the normal operation of the system
TERMS.SECTION_5_WARNING: This platform does NOT replace in-person professional medical care. In case of a medical emergency, immediately contact local emergency services.
TERMS.SECTION_6_TEXT: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon publication. Continued use of the service after any modification constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.
TERMS.CONTACT_TEXT: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, you can contact us:

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO: At the Health System, the protection of your personal data is our priority. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information.
PRIVACY.SECTION_1_TEXT: We collect the following types of information:
PRIVACY.USE_4_DESC: Anonymous analysis to optimize the platform
PRIVACY.ENCRYPTION_DESC: All information is transmitted using secure SSL/TLS protocols
PRIVACY.STORAGE_DESC: Your data is stored on security-certified servers
PRIVACY.ACCESS_DESC: Only authorized personnel can access sensitive information
PRIVACY.SECTION_5_TEXT: We use essential cookies for the operation of the platform, including:
PRIVACY.COOKIE_1: Session cookies to maintain your login
PRIVACY.COOKIE_2: Preference cookies to remember your settings
PRIVACY.NO_SELL: We do NOT sell your personal information to third parties under any circumstances.
PRIVACY.SHARE_TEXT: We only share information with authorized healthcare professionals that you have selected for your medical care.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_TEXT: If you have questions about this policy or wish to exercise your rights, contact us:
